mapper.update: update l_truck set truckid=truckid ,truckcode=#{truckcode} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,mintare=#{mintare} ,maxtare=#{maxtare} ,stdtare=#{stdtare} ,remark=#{remark} where truckid=#{truckid}

update l_truck set truckid=truckid ,truckcode=#{truckcode} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,mintare=#{mintare} ,maxtare=#{maxtare} ,stdtare=#{stdtare} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and truckid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and truckid =#{Where_Id} and truckid=#{Where_truckid} and truckcode=#{Where_truckcode} and trucknum=#{Where_trucknum} and mintare=#{Where_mintare} and maxtare=#{Where_maxtare} and stdtare=#{Where_stdtare} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.truckid "truckid", t.truckcode "truckcode", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.mintare "mintare", t.maxtare "maxtare", t.stdtare "stdtare", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark", lc.companyname companyname, lg.graindepotname graindepotname from l_truck t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid = t.companyid left join l_graindepot lg on lg.graindepotid = t.graindepotid where truckid=#{truckid}

select t.truckid "truckid", t.truckcode "truckcode", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.mintare "mintare", t.maxtare "maxtare", t.stdtare "stdtare", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from l_truck t where 1=1 and t.truckid=#{truckid} and t.truckcode=#{truckcode} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.mintare=#{mintare} and t.maxtare=#{maxtare} and t.stdtare=#{stdtare} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}

select t.truckid "truckid", t.truckcode "truckcode", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.mintare "mintare", t.maxtare "maxtare", t.stdtare "stdtare", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from l_truck t where 1=1 and t.truckid=#{truckid} and t.truckcode=#{truckcode} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.mintare=#{mintare} and t.maxtare=#{maxtare} and t.stdtare=#{stdtare} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}
mapper.delete: delete from l_truck where 1=1 and truckid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and truckid =#{Where_Id} and truckid=#{Where_truckid} and truckcode=#{Where_truckcode} and trucknum=#{Where_trucknum} and mintare=#{Where_mintare} and maxtare=#{Where_maxtare} and stdtare=#{Where_stdtare} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.truckid "truckid", t.truckcode "truckcode", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.mintare "mintare", t.maxtare "maxtare", t.stdtare "stdtare", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from l_truck t where 1=1 and t.truckid=#{truckid} and t.truckcode=#{truckcode} and ( trucknum LIKE CONCAT(#{trucknum})) and t.mintare=#{mintare} and t.maxtare=#{maxtare} and t.stdtare=#{stdtare} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}

select count(*) from l_truck t where 1=1 and t.truckid=#{truckid} and t.truckid!=#{NoId} and t.truckcode=#{truckcode} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.mintare=#{mintare} and t.maxtare=#{maxtare} and t.stdtare=#{stdtare} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}
select count(*) from l_truck WHERE 1=1 and trucknum=#{trucknum} and truckid!=#{truckid}
